name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Solana NFT Wallet Tracker (Live Wallet Notifications for Bitcoin, Eth, Sol)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Instant Wallet Transaction Notifications for Bitcoin Solana, Ethereum, & Polygon When a Wallet Buys/Sells (Magic Eden,Open Sea)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the edge when trading NFTs on Magic Eden with the Sol NFT Tracker Extension.

You may have questions such as:

What does this extension do?  

The Sol NFT Tracker Extension notifies you whenever a wallet buys or sells an NFT on Magic Eden, enabling you to mirror their trades and potentially earn significant profits. Additionally, it alerts you on when to sell an NFT you own on Magic Eden based on its purchase price and the current market trend.

The extension can track transactions for both Sol and Ethereum wallets on Magic Eden, allowing you to stay informed about activity in both ecosystems.

Sol NFT Tracker Extension provides real-time notifications when specific wallets take action on the Magic Eden Marketplace, such as listing, buying, or selling an NFT. This feature empowers you to monitor whale activity and make informed decisions.

Receive notifications as frequently as you desire regarding particular NFT collections, providing valuable insights such as percentage listed and floor price. This functionality helps you stay updated on market trends without constant manual monitoring.

So this Extension aims to resolve issues such as: 
How Do I Track Solana Wallets?  How Do I track Magic Eden Wallets? How Do I Track Bitcoin Wallets? How Do I Track Solana Collections?  How Do I Track Solana Whales?  How Do I Track Eth Whales? â€¦ and many more

Our tools enable you to carry on with your daily tasks without the need to constantly refresh pages to check floor prices.

As the Solana ecosystem continues to grow, this tool aims to provide traders with a competitive advantage and facilitate better decision-making.

This extension helps you to discover the newest NFT products on Magic Eden. It allows you to manage your NFTs with the ease of using the Magic Eden wallet.

You can compare NFT prices across the Magic Eden marketplace compared to and OpenSea. 

You can easily track Ordinal NFTs on the Magic Eden. You can stay up to date on Bitcoin related NFT on the Magic Eden sell collections platform. 

You can buy and sell NFT with BTC on the Magic Eden marketplace. You can stay connected with the latest updates on Magic Eden's Twitter. You can join the Solana community with this extension. You can also join the Magic Eden Discord community. You can discover the latest releases of Solana NFT on Magic Eden. 

 You can also use this extension to keep track of the token  nfts performance of Magic Eden and soon CoinGecko. 

Accessible with a simple click in your Chrome browser, our extension offers unparalleled insight into the world of NFT influencers and whales

Why you need this extension:
This extension helps you to discover the newest NFT products on Magic Eden. It allows you to manage your NFTs with the ease of using the Magic Eden wallet. You can compare NFT prices across the Magic Eden marketplace and OpenSea. You can easily track Ordinal NFTs on the Magic Eden.

It also impowers you to stay informed whenever a wallet acquires an NFT on the Solana Blockchain. Our extension tirelessly monitors NFT transactions from each address. Upon detecting an NFT transaction, the extension seamlessly notifies you with details such as price bought for/sold for what extension was bought. 


This extension aims to help you as a tool in order to profit with Solana NFT. Its good for new users to the Solana magiceden system, wondering what Solana NFT to buy and sell. for your magic eden wallet
